mapper.insert: insert into disposal_feedback(disposal_history_id, member_id, created_at) values (#{disposalHistoryId}, #{memberId}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM disposal_feedback WHERE disposal_history_id = #{disposalHistoryId}

SELECT f.feedback_id AS feedbackId, f.disposal_history_id AS disposalHistoryId, f.created_at AS createdAt, f.member_id AS memberId, h.ai_prediction AS aiPrediction, h.region_gu AS regionGu, h.final_item AS finalItem, i.disposal_img_url AS disposalHistoryImgUrl, m.nickname AS nickname FROM disposal_feedback f LEFT JOIN disposal_history h ON f.disposal_history_id = h.disposal_history_id LEFT JOIN disposal_history_img i ON h.disposal_history_id = i.disposal_history_id LEFT JOIN member m ON f.member_id = m.member_id WHERE f.disposal_history_id = #{disposalHistoryId} LIMIT 1

select f.feedback_id as feedbackId, f.disposal_history_id as disposalHistoryId, f.created_at as createdAt, f.member_id as memberId, h.ai_prediction as aiPrediction, h.region_gu as regionGu, h.final_item as finalItem, i.disposal_img_url as disposalHistoryImgUrl, m.nickname as nickname from disposal_feedback f left join disposal_history h on f.disposal_history_id = h.disposal_history_id left join disposal_history_img i on h.disposal_history_id = i.disposal_history_id join member m on f.member_id = m.member_id order by feedback_id desc
